abstract: The market value of mining giant Rio Tinto continues to outstrip the multibillion dollar bid put forward by rival BHP Billiton, Rio’s Chief Executive Tom Albanese said Sunday.
lead_paragraph: The market value of mining giant Rio Tinto continues to outstrip the multibillion dollar bid put forward by rival BHP Billiton, Rio’s Chief Executive Tom Albanese said Sunday.

headline.main: Market Has Spoken on BHP Bid, Rio Chief Says
